# AVExperienceController.Experience.multiview

**Case**

An experience where multiple videos play together.

## Declaration

```swift
case multiview
```

## Discussion

Configure this experience type using an [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVMultiviewManager].

It’s valid to transition to this experience from a player view controller that isn’t in a view hierarchy. This is useful when adding additional videos to a multiview experience.

Transition to embedded to remove an item from the multiview experience.

## Supported experiences

- **AVExperienceController.Experience.embedded**: An experience where the video embeds within its original container.
- **AVExperienceController.Experience.expanded**: An experience where the system places the video outside of its original container.
